name: Breach of Contract Reloaded
description:
Breach of Contract Reloaded is a multiplayer First-Person Shooter Game with a ton to offer.
MAIN FEATURES

  • Server Browser
  • Battle Royale, Free-For-All, Domination, and Elimination
  • In-Game Currency
  • 4 Maps
  • 4-10 players per match
  • Over a dozen weapons
  • Chat System (Team/Global)

Breach of Contract Reloaded is a new innovative First-Person Shooter Online Game. Compete with players all over the world. Battle against players in multiple terrains from outdoor environments to the indoors. Epic battles from 4-10 player matches allowing absolute chaos. With so many players to kill and GP to earn to purchase new weapons for battle what are you waiting for? Put endless amounts of time into the game.

The game is centered around the idea of simplistic and addictive gameplay. With multiple different game modes to play you can pick your battles and fight in totally different scenarios. Earn weapons in this game to make you the best. Fight your way to the top and be the best!


Progressive System
Earn more weapons by killing enemy players. Accumulate GP (Gamepoints) and purchase new weapons.
